name: White Cliffs–Ultra Flat (Acrylic) #3 / 1 Quart
description: Our cleanest, gallery white. It's a go-to for ceilings and trim, and a classic for walls. Digital swatches are a rough estimation of color - purchasing sample jars or sample chip sets are the best way to see actual colors. Our paints and pigments consist of natural ingredients - there can be slight variation between batches.

additionalData.colorNotes: Bright white, leans cooler in tone.
